name: Vortic WhatsApp
description:
A pretentious style for WhatsApp Web, themed around 'Composition' (1913) by Wyndham Lewis. (Though I very much doubt he would approve!)
Based on Dark Teal WhatsApp by Thiago D'Andrea
additional_info:
16.11.17 - Update - Fixed the textbox to not be white on white anymore. Oops. --- 15.11.17 - Update: - Fixes to restore the design after the source changed - Intro page replacement no longer working. Needs to be re-selected, as it no longer has the into class, but a random string. 10.10.17 - Update: - Fixed the emoji/GIF disappearance - A bunch of small changes - I think I might have ruined it. Not sure about the shadow and the border-radius. We'll see. - How the feck do I change that background?? --- 1.10.17 - Update: * Removed the annoying notification in the top left * Small fixes * Changed background CDN to RawGit. Hopefully it'll be synced soon. --- A first draft - looks complete, but probably has many unmodified corners. If you find one or more, please tell me! (You don't have to, though)
Has 2 different Hebrew Google Fonts, cuz I'm a yid. Useless for most of you, so I should probably make it optional.
Based on Dark Teal WhatsApp by Thiago D'Andrea
